headline: Nasdaq Raises Medium‑Term Revenue Outlook and Outlines Strategy for Its Next Phase of Scalable Growth at 2026 Investor Day
summary: Nasdaq raises medium-term Solutions revenue outlook to 9-12% growthMaintains medium-term outlook for expense growth of 5-8%Company reinforces its position as trusted transformation partner in the AI eraCommits to actioning AI productivity program with an expense efficiency target of $100 million by 2027 NEW YORK, Feb. 25, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Nasdaq (Nasdaq: NDAQ) today will host its Investor Day at 8:00 a.m. ET, where Adena Friedman, Nasdaq Chair and CEO, Sarah Youngwood, Nasdaq Executive V
